bookingSettings.title: Booking Settings
bookingSettings.bookingSlotsIntervalHelper: Interval between available booking slots (e.g., 30 = slots every 30 minutes)
bookingSettings.bookingFirstSlotIntervalHelper: Minimum time from now until the first bookable slot (minimum: 10 minutes)
bookingSettings.bookingCancellationIntervalHelper: Minimum time before booking start time when cancellation is allowed
bookingSettings.bookingUpdatingIntervalHelper: Minimum time before booking start time when updates are allowed
bookingSettings.defaultTimezoneHelper: Default timezone for availability rules (IANA timezone identifier). UTC offset is calculated automatically.
bookingSettings.timezoneChangedWarning: Changing timezone requires all active availability rules to be archived first.

bookingSettings.failedToUpdate: Failed to update booking settings. Please try again.
bookingSettings.mustBeGreaterThanOrEqual: Must be greater than or equal to 0
bookingSettings.mustBeGreaterThanOrEqual10: Must be greater than or equal to 10 minutes
